mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_musical WHERE deleted_yn = 'N'
SELECT musical_idx, musical_name, musical_startperiod, musical_endperiod, musical_img FROM t_musical WHERE deleted_yn = "N" ORDER BY musical_like_ct desc LIMIT #{offset}, 8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_musical (musical_idx, musical_name, musical_actor, musical_runningtime, musical_startperiod, musical_endperiod, musical_img, musical_detail_img, musical_price) VALUES (#{musicalIdx}, #{musicalName}, #{musicalActor}, #{musicalRunningtime}, #{musicalStartperiod}, #{musicalEndperiod}, #{musicalImg}, #{musicalDetailImg}, #{musicalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT musical_idx, musical_name, musical_actor, musical_runningtime, musical_startperiod, musical_endperiod, musical_img, musical_detail_img, musical_price FROM t_musical WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' AND musical_idx=#{musicalIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_musical SET musical_name = #{musicalName}, musical_actor = #{musicalActor}, musical_runningtime = #{musicalRunningtime}, musical_startperiod = #{musicalStartperiod}, musical_endperiod = #{musicalEndperiod}, musical_img = #{musicalImg}, musical_detail_img = #{musicalDetailImg}, musical_price = #{musicalPrice} WHERE musical_idx = #{musicalIdx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_musical SET deleted_yn = 'Y', musical_idx = musical_idx WHERE musical_idx = #{musicalIdx}
